feed.title: Homer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.03.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • fix(cards): hide overflow to avoid scroll bars in cards in 11934c3995ecd52e304f9627fc078c95e9780204

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.03.1...v25.03.2

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.03.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Add YAML config schema for auto complete support by @cbos in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/883
  • fix(docker): Avoid logging docker healthcheck requests. by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/890

New Contributors

  • @cbos made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/883

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.03.2...v25.03.3

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.04.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fix typos in config-schema.json by @mbelangergit in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/894
  • For Portainer Service : add status online/offline and version of the card by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/898
  • Add service matrix, view status and version by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/899
  • Add service vaultwarden, view status and version by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/900
  • add service TruenasScale, view status and version by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/901
  • Add Linkding support by @cbos in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/895

New Contributors

  • @mbelangergit made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/894
  • @thibaut1304 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/898

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.03.3...v25.04.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.05.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fix schema typos by @molhamalnasr in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/906
  • Added Plex and Docker Socket Proxy service by @marcokreeft87 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/903
  • Grammatically updated by @Rishi1208 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/919
  • Fix typo in customservices docs by @tanasegabriel in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/916
  • feat(pihole): Support Pi-hole v6 API with session management (#875) by @molhamalnasr in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/913

New Contributors

  • @marcokreeft87 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/903
  • @Rishi1208 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/919

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.04.1...v25.05.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.05.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • feat(smart-cards): handle dynamic loading error by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/923
  • docs: configure Pi-Hole v6 API with URL that ends with admin by @eoleedi in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/925
  • Do not mandate the usage of an API key for Pi-hole v6 by @tanasegabriel in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/927
  • Do not force lang by @juanjosepablos in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/932

New Contributors

  • @eoleedi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/925
  • @juanjosepablos made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/932

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.05.1...v25.05.2
